source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, low-angle shot of a large, flooded hallway with a liminal and eerie aesthetic. The camera is positioned just above the surface of the murky water, looking down the long, white corridor toward a distant doorway. The scene remains completely still throughout the clip.
